title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Introducing the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping, the ultimate choice for a comfortable and refreshing night's sleep. 

These cooling bed pillows come in a set of 2, perfect for sharing or keeping an extra one on hand. Crafted with high-quality materials, these pillows are designed to provide the utmost comfort and support.

The fill material is made of plush hollow fiber, giving you the luxurious feel of down without any of the allergies. The down alternative microfiber filling ensures a soft and cozy experience for all sleepers. 

Whether you sleep on your back, stomach, or side, these pillows are suitable for all sleep positions. The no-shift construction keeps the filling in place, providing consistent support throughout the night. 

Experience breathability like never before with the COZSINOOR cooling bed pillows. The breathable design allows for proper air circulation, keeping you cool and sweat-free even during hot summer nights. 

Not only are these pillows breathable, but they are also skin-friendly. The cover material is a soft and smooth polyester blend, gentle on your skin and hypoallergenic. 

Taking care of your pillows is a breeze with the machine-washable feature. Simply throw them in the washing machine at a temperature of 30째C and tumble dry on low for easy maintenance. 

To ensure convenience and freshness upon arrival, these pillows are vacuum-packed. Give them a recommended waiting time of 24 hours to fully expand and regain their original shape.

Upgrade your sleeping experience with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping. Indulge in hotel-quality comfort and enjoy a restful night's sleep like never before.
